data.name: 通天魔塔-MagicTower
data.detailed_description:
The game is a single RPG game, support multilingual mode. The game needs a lot of thinking, any rash choice may lead to the failure of the game.
There are different people in the magic tower who need help. Help them unlock more images. The magic tower is full of demons. How to kill them without effort?
It's all about whether you can pass the customs perfectly. This game is a tough test for IQ.
So if you like challenges, please don't miss them! This is a very classic game, as a warrior you have to break through one layer after another of the magic tower, and finally reach the top of the tower, save your beautiful princess.
data.about_the_game:
The game is a single RPG game, support multilingual mode. The game needs a lot of thinking, any rash choice may lead to the failure of the game.
There are different people in the magic tower who need help. Help them unlock more images. The magic tower is full of demons. How to kill them without effort?
It's all about whether you can pass the customs perfectly. This game is a tough test for IQ.
So if you like challenges, please don't miss them! This is a very classic game, as a warrior you have to break through one layer after another of the magic tower, and finally reach the top of the tower, save your beautiful princess.
data.short_description: This is a relaxed role-playing game, you will embark on a mysterious and fantastic journey, face unknown challenges and unpredictable changes in the battle, discover the secret hidden in the magic tower.
data.supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Russian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Thai, Ukrainian, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 无
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i5+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5750 or better
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: 无
